Earthrise: The First Lunar Voyage, 20130101080000 +0000, Interviews with Apollo 8 astronauts, their wives, mission control staff, and journalists give true insider's perspective to the space race of the late 1960's.

How to Colonize the Stars, 20090101080000 +0000, Leading physicists and engineers in the field of interstellar travel discuss some of the deep issues we face when considering the problem of sending spacecraft to other stars. Will mankind ever truly become a space fairing civilization?

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 1, S01E01, Between 1960 and 1972, mankind boldly went where no human had been before. Across 11 manned missions, 24 men flew to the moon and 12 walked upon its surface. This film documents Apollo 17 through the eyes of the astronauts who flew.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 2, S01E02, In this episode, hear first hand testimonials and dialogue from the incredible men who walked on the moon. Incredible footage and photos give a unique and beautiful experience of their data collection process and journey home.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Superscopes

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: The Heartland Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E05, In the 1980s, a suspected serial killer preyed on women in small towns located on the banks of the Mississippi River until the murders abruptly ceased and went unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: Officer Down
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E06, The longest-running cold case of a law enforcement officer in the United States was the murder of Sheriff's Lt. Joe Clark.

MST3K: Escape 2000, 19960302000000 +0000, A grunge punk fights an evil corporation enforcing an evacuation of the Bronx in Escape from the Bronx (1983). Mike and the Bots have "Men's Night" on the SOL and Dr. Forester tries to come up with a way to boost the show's ratings.
MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus, 19901229000000 +0000, A multinational team of astronauts heads to Venus, but finds a world destroyed by nuclear war.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon, 19910622000000 +0000, The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos, 19910727000000 +0000, Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.
MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron, 19910907000000 +0000, It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra, 19911019000000 +0000, The seventh offering from Gamera: the infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination. Joel and the Bots build a scale model of Gamera and make shoebox dioramas.
MST3K: Hercules, 19930617000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots have a casual day on the SOL and endure another incoherent Hercules movie (Hercules (1958)).

Plainsong, 20040325000000 +0000, Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler, 20090419000000 +0000, The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazi's for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.

The Magic of Ordinary Days, 20050130000000 +0000, Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

The Wedding March, 20160625000000 +0000, After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man. Stars Jack Wagner, Emily Tennant and Josie Bissett.

Timeless Love, 20200614000000 +0000, Megan wakes up from a coma. The husband and 2 kids she just dreamed about aren't real. At her first job interview, she meets Thomas from her dream – or was it a vision into the future? Starring Rachel Skarsten and Brant Daugherty.
The Shell Seekers, 19891203000000 +0000, A reclusive British matron of comfortable means suffers a near-fatal heart attack and decides it's time to get her life in order. Stars Angela Lansbury.

The Summer of Ben Tyler, 19961215000000 +0000, In the deep South in the 1940s, an up-and-coming young lawyer finds the courage to make a difficult moral decision with the help of his family, especially a young, mentally handicapped black man that they have adopted.

programme.title: Buried Treasures
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Nell discovers a treasure map that Bree made as a teen.

programme.title: Grand Openings
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. As the nightclub opening nears, Trace spends late nights practicing.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Mick receives damaging information about Thomas.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.title: The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E11, Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Outsiders
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E12, Col. Sheppard and his team locate Dr. Carson Beckett on an alien planet where he is treating a small group of survivors of the Hoffan plague. But that same evening, a party of Wraith warriors arrives, threatening total annihilation.

programme.title: Inquisition
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E13, A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: The Prodigal
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E14, Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Remnants
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E15, While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E19, When Col. Telford reveals the Destiny is in imminent danger of being boarded by the Lucian Alliance, they launch an attack on the Lucian Alliance’s secret base. Meanwhile, the Lucian Alliance forces Dr. Rush to help stage an assault on the Destiny.

programme.title: Incursion (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E20, The Destiny crew must fight for their lives when members of the Lucian Alliance come through the Stargate, hell-bent on taking the ship by force. Meanwhile, the Destiny starts having ship-wide power blackouts caused by deadly bursts of radiation.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E01, After Colonel Young and his military personnel are captured by the Lucian Alliance, Dannic abandons them on a nearby planet. Meanwhile on the ship, Dr. Rush, Brody, Chloe, and Eli attempt a risky plan to force the Lucians to surrender.

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E02, With the need for food and water becoming dire, Dr. Rush manages to find a planet within range that seems viable but can only be accessed by shuttle. When nearing the planet, they encounter violent turbulence and must make a dangerous crash landing.

programme.title: Avalon (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E01, Lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell, the newest member of the SG-1 team, sets out on a mission with Daniel Jackson, Teal'c and Vala to uncover a stash of hidden ancient riches. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Avalon (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E02, Still bound together by the Jaffa bracelets, Daniel Jackson and Vala are transported to a galaxy populated by worshippers of a potentially threatening authority called the Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Origin
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E03, Daniel and Vala learn that their reactivation of an ancient communications device has inadvertently exposed Earth to the wrath of the group of unforgiving deities called Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Ties That Bind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E04, Daniel Jackson and Vala embark on a series of dangerous missions in their quest to unlock the frustrating Jaffa bracelets that seems to have bound them together for eternity. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Powers That Be
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E05, When Daniel and Vala attempt to undo the teachings of the Ori on a distant planet, they and the planet's inhabitants find themselves subject to their foe's vengeful wrath. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Beachhead
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E06, The brilliant astrophysicist and former member Samantha Carter returns to SG-1 to join the team on a mission to free a distant planet called Kallana from the Ori's control. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Ex Deus Machina
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E07, The SG-1 team must intervene when a major ongoing conflict between the strident Jaffa Gerak and their former enemy Ba'al puts the entire United States at risk of destruction. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Offensive Interference
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E11, Donna makes the Rose Court, and her mother reveals her reasons for not supporting her in the pageant.

programme.title: Breast Side Up
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Courting
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E13, Joe rejects a plea bargain and decides to go to trial. The Associated Press picks up Brandon's story about the trial for nationwide syndication. Colin babysits for Erin while Kelly and David are at the trial.

programme.title: Fortunate Son
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E14, Donna fills in for Lisa at a convenience store. A young boy is caught stealing a teddy bear for his brother's birthday, but Donna covers for him. Brandon alienates Nat and Susan as he gets carried away during the After Dark's charity casino night.

programme.title: Angels We Have Heard on High
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E15, Cindy surprises Brandon by coming to visit for Christmas. Joe tries to keep an antsy Donna in suspense about her Christmas/birthday present.

programme.title: Fade In, Fade Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E17, Kelly's father swoops into town, and once again sweeps her off of her feet with promises of a relationship. Nat is reunited with an old-flame.

programme.title: Snowbound
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E18, Kelly takes refuge back with Colin, and ends up on a bender.

programme.title: Nancy's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E19, Susan is nominated for a college journalism award for her story about a girl's decision to have an abortion. Valerie arranges a meeting between Colin and a knowledgeable art buyer in the hopes of encouraging Colin to get clean and focus on his career.

programme.title: Flying
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E23, Brandon and Susan spend the weekend at her parents' house. Colin and Valerie's new relationship upsets David and Kelly. Joe's older brother Hank comes to town and tries to discourage him from undergoing surgery.

programme.title: Coming Out, Getting Out, Going Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E24, Valerie puts the club up as collateral to bail Colin out of jail. Kelly comes home from rehab and Donna is put off by the frequent phone calls from a lonely Tara. Clare, Susan, Brandon and Steve organize a romantic evening for the Nat and Joan.

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E25, Rush dumps Ryan and Austin off on Steve on the same day that he is hosting a fraternity party. Kelly invites Tara to stay with her after she finishes her stint in rehab.

programme.title: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E26, Brandon, Steve, and Joe go on a camping trip with Susan, Clare, and Donna. The girls become jealous when the guys repeatedly ignore them to help some damsels in distress. Tara sabotages Kelly's relationship with Greg.

programme.title: Ticket To Ride
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E29, Colin tries to remain strong as he prepares to turn himself in and begin his prison term. Brandon and Susan lose a five-thousand-dollar lottery ticket, leading to a major argument.

programme.title: Ray Of Hope
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E30, Kelly agrees to help with the search for Colin when Brandon reveals that Nat could fall victim to the bail bondsman through his business ties to Valerie. Donna balks when she and David are asked to produce a music video for Ray.

programme.title: Houdini/Dispatcher Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E149, A magician was attempting a dangerous stunt and became the victim of miscalculation. Emergency operator collapses

programme.title: Repentent Drunk/5 Yr Old Home Alone
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E373, A drunk driver causes a head-on collision. A 5-year old girl calls 911 when she comes home to an empty house.

programme.title: Runaway Car/Jackson Med Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E379, A woman is unable to stop her car as it reaches speeds over 100-miles per hour. Three girls are treated in the hospital after an accident.

programme.title: Cobra Chaos/Choking Granny
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E164, A Florida man was bitten by his deadly pet Asian Cobra. A grandmother chokes on a homemade roll.

programme.title: Trading Places/Mystery Dispatch
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E334, A 73-year-old Vermont resident is held at knifepoint by an escaped prisoner. Virginia emergency workers receive an unusual call.

programme.title: Mother Shooting/Conrail Train
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E247, A woman is awoken by her husband, who is standing bedside aiming a .22 caliber rifle at her face. Two young children are playing on the railroad tracks oblivious to a freight train bearing down on them.

programme.title: Fire Ant/Spiderman Rescue
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E123, 26-month-old baby falls into a swarm of fire ants/Woman trapped on the ledge of apartment building 20 ft. up.

programme.title: Bathtub Baby/Lightning Lads
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E133, Eight months old is found floating face down in the bathtub / 2 boys both go into cardiac arrest after the tree they take shelter under is struck by lightning.

programme.title: Underage Teen/Cardiac Controller
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E328, A 12-year-old girl is injured when she takes a car for a ride. A Seattle air traffic controller is found unconscious.

programme.title: MOTHER'S DAY FLOOD/ROLLERBLADE
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E323, Two women are trapped by a roaring flash flood. A boy rollerblading is hit by a truck.

programme.title: Pacoima Cliff/American River
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E104, Cliff climber loses footing/gold prospector gets pinned down underwater

programme.title: Stabbing, Shooting/Fancy Dancer
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E264, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: Iron Jockey/Tucson Victim
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E182, Jockey is injured when his horse takes a spill. Rescue 911 is on-scene at Tucson's Victim Witness Crisis Unit.

programme.title: Las Vegas, Part 2/Bootless Hero
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E215, EMS in Las Vegas named number one EMS network in the country. Drinking men go fishing near swampy Everglades.

programme.title: Suicide/Highway Hero
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E184, A telemarketer connects to an answering machine with a message that sounds like a suicide threat. Rescue 911 rides with officers of Baltimore's quick response team.

programme.title: Sis Burn Car/Children’s Doc
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E115, Mom caught in burning car / Visiting children's national medical center in DC

programme.title: Balcony Fall/Bank Capture
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E208, Teen sneaking out to party falls from a fourth-floor balcony. A teller is able to call 911 during a bank robbery.

programme.title: Stevie Saves Dad/Hunting Horror
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E223, A 5 year old calls 911 when his father falls down a flight of stairs. A couple is accidentally shot y a hunter.

programme.title: Bone Marrow/Virginia Beach Ems
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E375, A bone marrow donor must be found for a toddler. Rescue 911 follows the Virginia Beach volunteer EMS team.

programme.title: Resurrection/3 Year Old

programme.title: Pier Pressure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E05, Hobie and Summer each find themselves torn between doing the right thing and giving in to dangerous social pressures.

programme.title: Showdown at Malibu Beach High
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E06, Malibu Beach High students square off against the administration's plans to sell sacred Chumash Indian lands. And Garner quits the beach to work as a street cop again, only to be stuck in an office job by his vindictive captain.

programme.title: Point Doom
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E07, Matt's tempestuous affair with a gorgeous motorcycle racer takes him to the brink, while Mitch and Stephanie go head-to-head in a spirited battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Princess of Tides
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E08, A thrilling muscle boat competition is the backdrop for a whirlwind romance between Mitch and a beautiful woman he doesn't know is both a princess and the target of an assassination plot.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E09, Mitch and Stephanie board a yacht disguised as wealthy southern honeymooners to capture a group of modern-day pirates and find themselves oddly attracted to each other's undercover character.

programme.title: Lifeguards Can't Jump
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E10, Mitch and Garner go undercover as a two-on-two street basketball team to solve a young athlete's murder. CJ becomes involved with an amorous, honeymooning Midwestern tourist.

programme.title: Dead of Summer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E11, A rock concert and political rally are the backdrop for a chilling assassination plot that finds CJ unconscious on an explosive-laden Scarab heading for the crowded pier.

programme.title: A Matter of Life and Death
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E12, A dispute between Mitch's lifeguard career and his father's desire to have him take over the family architecture business becomes intensified by devastating news about the elder Buchannon.

programme.title: Island of Romance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E13, CJ and Stephanie travel to Catalina Island for a "girls-only” weekend getaway, only to be distracted by two handsome men, leading to a life and death encounter. When Mitch and Hobie hire a gorgeous Swedish au pair, amorous complications ensue.

programme.title: Strangers Among Us
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E14, Mitch and Stephanie cope with an odd assembly of UFO enthusiasts camping on the beach in anticipation of an extraterrestrial visitation. Smugglers threaten Summer to recover diamonds they hid inside a surfboard Slade gave her.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E15, The Baywatch lifeguards set sail on a romantic cruise, only to encounter a dangerous fugitive, who forces Mitch and Stephanie overboard into the stormy Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E16, While on a vacation cruise, the Baywatch lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers, leaving Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the stormy Pacific, and Summer, Matt, CJ, and Guido faced with outwitting ruthless killers who have overtaken the ship.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E17, An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower, necessitating a thrilling subterranean rescue attempt by Mitch and Matt.

programme.title: Stakeout at Surfrider Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E18, Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers. Meanwhile, CJ and Stephanie help Guido pretend to be a lifeguard in order to impress his visiting mother.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E19, When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E20, Paralyzed during a heroic rescue, Mitch undergoes a vigorous rehabilitation regimen. Meanwhile, Jason, a ten-year-old paraplegic, is pursued by a hitman trying to keep him from testifying against gangsters.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E21, Mitch coaches Matt in an amateur kickboxing tournament, but the competition turns deadly when an enemy from Mitch's past gets him into the ring. Meanwhile, CJ, seduced by a fashion photographer, considers leaving Baywatch for a modeling career.
